release.action: Make sure special characters in String array and Map data types are handled properly. This also introduces a new widget type "MAP" which has to be used for all parameters of data type "Map", editing map parameters with "TEXT_MULTIFIELD" widget is no longer supported.
Make configuration editor clientlib compatible with AEM 6.2 and non-admin users by moving it to /etc/clientlibs.
Relax package version dependency for javax.inject to support AEM60, AEM61 and AEM62.
Set AEM API and OSGi dependencies to provided scope.
Correctly display overridden default configuration values.
Lock parameter in editor which has a locked override value form an override provider.
Add support for ":locked" suffix in parameter override scope strings to disallow overriding them in nested configuration scopes.
Fixed the configuration id shown in the editor
Fixed the minified version of the editor app caused by "wrong" usage of the angularjs injection mechanism
Property locked in the higher level configuration should not be editable in the deeper level configurations
Multiple locked parameter names are not saved as array
